name: jobr-plus
description: Improves the UX of the Jobr interface for time entry.
author: Ferguson Digital

scripts.package: rm -f dist/jobr-plus-chrome.zip dist/jobr-plus-firefox.zip && cd dist/chrome && zip -vr ../jobr-plus-chrome.zip * && cd ../firefox && zip -vr ../jobr-plus-firefox.zip *
scripts.dev:firefox: npm run build && cd dist/firefox && web-ext run --start-url ferguson.jobr.mobi
